text: The Restoration (), or Bourbon Restoration (Spanish: Restauración borbónica), is the time that began on 29 December 1874—after a coup by Martínez Campos that ended the First Spanish Republic and restored the monarchy under Alfonso XII. This period ended on 14 April 1931 with the proclamation of the Second Spanish Republic. Category:1874 establishments Category:1931 disestablishments Category:Former monarchies of Europe Category:19th century in Spain Category:20th century in Spain
title: Restoration (Spain)
